page.title: 09New Hedges Community Hall
page.content: The new village Hall at New Hedges,has been completed in time for the social season of activities.A new roof and attractively refurbished stone work has given the former village school a new look. Already a new number of fund_raising events have been staged in the hall.The community council meets there; so does the Woman's Institute. It is an ideal centre for social functions and local organisers are already taking note of it's attractions and the convenience of the setting. A committee was set up and registered as a charity and the site leased from the church authorities.Community Council members were pleased to hear that the Village Hall is proving a popular meeting place for a variety of activities.
